p.strong: Ohio Governor DeWine’s mandate: All Ohio school buildings will remain closed and remote learning will continue through the end of the 2019-2020 school year.

div.a: Tuesdays are Grab and Go meal days!

p.strong: Pickup at Carrollton High School – Middle School - 10:45 AM to 12:45 PM OR at nine different locations in the community. (Learn more)

a.title: Click to read more about: Tuesdays are Grab and Go meal days!

div.a: Read More about Tuesdays are Grab and Go meal days!

span.p: The Carrollton Elementary School phone number is 330-627-4592. We apologize for the mistake on Google - we are trying to correct the issue.

During next week's meal distribution on April 28, CEVSD will be collecting non-perishable and essential cleaning supplies for the district CARE Team. Throughout a typical school year, the CARE Team helps as many as 150 local families, and during the COVID - 19 crisis in the last 5 weeks, the organization has had requests from more than 80 families in need! This necessity has emptied the shelves at the CARE office, and assistance is needed from the community to meet these vital needs!
We are asking those in the community who are able to donate, to please bring items to the CHS-CMS food distribution site or one of the other nine community stops listed below. Thank you for your generosity! #CarrolltonCares #Weareinthistogether 🖤❤️🚍 Click for lists of items
